Package com.soa.activity

Interface Summary
ActivityContext Provides the context in which an activity is performed.
ActivityDeployer Interface for deploying an activity for a process.
ActivityPerformer Interface of an activity that can be executed by a virtual service process.
ActivityPerformerFactory Interface of a factory that will create an activity implementation based on a given definition.
ActivityPerformerRegistry Interface for retrieving an ActivityPerformer for a given activity.
AuditLog Provides audit logging capabilities.
 

Class Summary
ActivityErrorCode
